function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased dependence on telemedicine may lead to communication errors, misinterpretation of symptoms, and ineffective triage of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate data privacy and security measures in telemedicine platforms may lead to unauthorized access to sensitive health information and potential exposure of contagious disease status.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of medical staff due to increased demand for services","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of necessary resources such as ventilators, intensive care units, and protective equipment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical contacts between healthcare workers and patients","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social interaction due to reliance on smart technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Over-reliance on smart technologies for health information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependency on smart robots for healthcare tasks","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased spread of misinformation and fake news related to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient use of digital social networks for pandemic response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Psychological issues and mental health problems caused by social isolation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of facial recognition technology to verify compliance with self-quarantine rules","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparent communication about virus conditions and threats","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation through online communication platforms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection of gps and personal data by bluetooth-based apps","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale tracing of infected individuals using smart technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforcement of strict quarantine measures through tracing and monitoring apps","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale uptake of contact tracing apps may raise privacy concerns and lead to data breaches.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on smart solutions such as surveillance systems and positioning technology may infringe on individual privacy and civil liberties.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of smart technology to track and trace infected individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of smart helmets for screening and identifying suspected cases of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on face and voice recognition technologies to reduce the need for touching surfaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on ai-based technologies for early detection and monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy concerns and ethical implications of mass surveillance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on technology for social distancing enforcement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of facial recognition and tracking technologies for crowd detection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on smart technologies to control virus transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-pharmaceutical measures as a substitute for medical solutions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of smart technologies for mass surveillance and enforcement of pandemic protocols","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of fake news complicating crisis management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread and transmission of virus in public places","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale monitoring using chatbot-based systems may infringe on privacy and data security","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Automatic detection of people using computer vision may lead to privacy concerns and surveillance issues","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analysis of travel card data may pose risks to individual privacy and data security","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying solely on wearable sensors and smart solutions for large-scale detection of cases may result in inaccurate or incomplete data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on centralized cloud platforms for reporting health information may pose privacy and security risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on smart solutions for hotspot identification may lead to neglect of other critical factors contributing to disease spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collection of personal data through face scanners and iot devices raises privacy concerns and potential misuse of data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on machine learning and ai models for disease prediction may lead to inaccuracies and false predictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential misuse of voice recognition apps and ai models for discrimination and stigmatization of individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of crises such as covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Coordination and collaboration challenges in different contexts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Fragmented management in public health emergency systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of access to data for evidence-based decision making","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Failure to identify and understand social and environmental risks compounded by pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited cooperation between different departments, hospitals, and institutions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Fragmented governance and limited cooperation between different sectors and levels of governance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Timely implementation of border control and closure of land and sea borders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Repurposing urban command and control centers for surveillance and tracing of infected individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Repurposing integrated command and control centers as covid-19 war rooms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
